about_the_game:
S. Prysm Destroyer is a 2.5d platformer anime action highscore game with contra-style gameplay where you control a 28 meter tall robot in order to destroy animal shaped robot monsters with the help of upgrades and special powers based on elements and colors.

Fight against the Primordial

They have been roaming the once occupied human cities for a long time and forced people to live in walking domes.
Exterminate them all and regain freedom.

Use the prysmals to obtain greater power

Primal sources of energy and power leaved by rich comets, Prysm Destroyer was made to use them to its full potential giving you great special powers for a limited amount of time. They also look very cool!

Obtain the best score and unlock cute costumes

The better you play, the more score you’ll get and more cute costumes for Amor you’ll unlock. Costumes such as maid, bunny girl and gothic lolita and more!


Amor

A cute girl that fell in love with a boy whose passion was constructing robots. She was rather normal in her own way but after a tragic event it seems like she acts as if she does not have any emotions anymore.
Whenever she enters Prysm Destroyer, her left eye color turns blue.
Amor loves hear punk rock music, her favorite food is chicken with fries and her fashion color choice is pink. She seems to be very affectionate with her jacket.

Prysm Destroyer

A robot. A SUPER robot, as some would say. It was a project made by Chitzu, inspired by those cool mecha animes. He was made out of scrap and made as if he was a legendary warrior.
It was given two stamps:
-The left one, an orange S meaning SUPER. Its Chitzu logo, the seal of quality
-The right one, given by Amor. Its the logo of her favorite rock band, Lovely Killers ON STAGE.

Chitzu

He is not playable in the game.
Maybe he is a genius or just a stupid guy with big dreams. Either way, what he has achieved is not really normal for a normal boy. He once had a dream of being free and walk around the planet with no one stopping him. Honestly it’s just an excuse to create cool robots.
Chitzu was always wearing the jacket once gave by his mother.
After his death, his creation has been acting more different and harsh in combat, the reasons are unknown.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has some revealing outfits

detailed_description:
S. Prysm Destroyer is a 2.5d platformer anime action highscore game with contra-style gameplay where you control a 28 meter tall robot in order to destroy animal shaped robot monsters with the help of upgrades and special powers based on elements and colors.

Fight against the Primordial

They have been roaming the once occupied human cities for a long time and forced people to live in walking domes.
Exterminate them all and regain freedom.

Use the prysmals to obtain greater power

Primal sources of energy and power leaved by rich comets, Prysm Destroyer was made to use them to its full potential giving you great special powers for a limited amount of time. They also look very cool!

Obtain the best score and unlock cute costumes

The better you play, the more score you’ll get and more cute costumes for Amor you’ll unlock. Costumes such as maid, bunny girl and gothic lolita and more!


Amor

A cute girl that fell in love with a boy whose passion was constructing robots. She was rather normal in her own way but after a tragic event it seems like she acts as if she does not have any emotions anymore.
Whenever she enters Prysm Destroyer, her left eye color turns blue.
Amor loves hear punk rock music, her favorite food is chicken with fries and her fashion color choice is pink. She seems to be very affectionate with her jacket.

Prysm Destroyer

A robot. A SUPER robot, as some would say. It was a project made by Chitzu, inspired by those cool mecha animes. He was made out of scrap and made as if he was a legendary warrior.
It was given two stamps:
-The left one, an orange S meaning SUPER. Its Chitzu logo, the seal of quality
-The right one, given by Amor. Its the logo of her favorite rock band, Lovely Killers ON STAGE.

Chitzu

He is not playable in the game.
Maybe he is a genius or just a stupid guy with big dreams. Either way, what he has achieved is not really normal for a normal boy. He once had a dream of being free and walk around the planet with no one stopping him. Honestly it’s just an excuse to create cool robots.
Chitzu was always wearing the jacket once gave by his mother.
After his death, his creation has been acting more different and harsh in combat, the reasons are unknown.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030ti
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

name: S. Prysm Destroyer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-7020U
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7300HQ
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: A 2D platform shooter where you DESTROY!! Get Elemental Powers from the Prysms and help Amor defeat the Primordial Threats agains Humanity! Get cute costumes and be stylish!
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
